longDef.en: a living thing that grows in earth, in water, or on other plants, usually has a stem, leaves, roots, and flowers, and produces seeds

examples.en: The industry was accused of having invested little in workers, plant, or infrastructure.
examples.cn: 工业界被指责在工人、工厂和基础设施方面投入太少。

longDef.en: a factory in which a particular product is made or power is produced

examples.en: Two more car-assembly plants were closed by the strike.
examples.cn: 另有两家汽车装配厂因罢工而关闭。

longDef.en: a large, heavy machine or vehicle used in industry, for building roads, etc.
longDef.cn: （用于修路等的重型）设备，装置，机械

examples.en: The sign by the roadworks said "Slow - heavy plant crossing".
examples.cn: 道路工程旁边的告示牌上写着“减速——前方有重型施工机械”。

examples.en: The firm's main business was plant hire.
examples.cn: 这家公司的主要业务是设备租赁。

longDef.en: something illegal or stolen that has been put secretly in a person's clothing or among the things that belong to them to make them seem guilty of a crime

examples.en: He insisted the money was a plant.
examples.cn: 他坚持说钱是被人栽赃嫁祸。

longDef.en: to put a plant into the ground or into a container of soil so that it will grow

examples.en: We planted trees and bushes in our new garden.
examples.cn: 我们在新花园里种了树和灌木。

examples.en: Hyacinth bulbs planted in pots now will flower early in the spring.
examples.cn: 如果现在种在花盆里，风信子的球茎会在早春开花。

longDef.en: If you plant a particular area, you put plants into the ground there.

examples.en: The plot was surrounded by a stone wall and planted with flowering trees.
examples.cn: 那个地方围着石墙，种着繁花盛开的树。

examples.en: a densely planted garden (= one in which the plants are close together)

longDef.en: to put something firmly and strongly in a particular place

examples.en: My brother planted himself on the sofa in front of the television.
examples.cn: 我哥哥坐在电视机前的沙发上。

examples.en: He planted a kiss on her forehead/a blow on his opponent's jaw.
examples.cn: 他在她的额头上吻了一下／一拳打在对手的下巴上。

longDef.en: to cause an idea or story to exist

examples.en: That incident planted doubts about him in my mind.
examples.cn: 这件事让我对他产生了怀疑。

longDef.en: to put something or someone in a position secretly, especially in order to deceive someone

examples.en: She insisted that the drugs had been planted on her without her knowledge.
examples.cn: 她坚持说毒品是在她毫不知晓的情况下有人栽赃给她的。

longDef.en: to put a bomb somewhere so that it will explode there

examples.en: The bomb was planted in the station waiting room.
examples.cn: 炸弹被放置在车站的候车室内。
